alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Roger Mills; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 4:17AM CDT until July 06 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Southwestern Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 417 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shattuck to 5 miles northwest of Durham to 7 miles south of Canadian, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shattuck, Arnett, Gage, Reydon, Crawford, Harmon, Roll, Durham, and Angora. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
